oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Coffee Time - 1947-12-0d
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WLAC program Martha White Coffee Time, originally broadcast early December 1947 at 5:15 am. (Date based on Bob Jennings referring to 'Friday night December 5th this week'.) Personnel include Bill Johnson (announcer), Bob Jennings (host/performer), Cousin Lily White (performer), Jimmy Wilson (performer), and Little Joe (performer). Lily White talks about her restaurant, The Lily White Restaurant, opening 'next Wednesday' at '7th and Russell Street'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Jennings; Jimmy Wilson; Lily White
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test band of radio program -- Test band of rehearsal -- Martha White jingle -- Opening statement (Bill Johnson) -- Opening statement (Bob Jennings) -- Jambalaya (On the Bayou) (Bob Jennings) -- Martha White jingle -- Martha White commercial (Bill Johnson) -- Bob Jennings introduces Lily White -- Bob Jennings and Lily White talk about her restaurant opening -- You Rule My Heart (Lily White) -- Bob Jennings announces upcoming performances -- When Jesus Beckons Me Home (Bob Jennings, Lily White) -- Martha White commercial (Bill Johnson) -- Fire On The Mountain (Little Joe fiddle) -- I'll Always Take Care Of You (Bob Jennings) -- Closing statement (Bob Jennings) -- Martha White jingle -- Closing statement (Bill Johnson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WLAC (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Martha White coffee time (Radio program); Martha White Foods; Jennings, Bob (Musician)
